mapper.select: select makeremittance_id, makeremittance_serialnumber, makeremittance_time, makeremittance_price, makeremittance_paynumber, makeremittance_name, makeremittance_number, makeremittance_payuserid, makeremittance_payname, makeremittance_branch from js_bank_account.makeremittance where makeremittance_id = #{makeremittanceId}

select makeremittance_id, makeremittance_serialnumber, makeremittance_time, makeremittance_price, makeremittance_paynumber, makeremittance_name, makeremittance_number, makeremittance_payuserid, makeremittance_payname, makeremittance_branch from js_bank_account.makeremittance limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into js_bank_account.makeremittance(makeremittance_serialnumber, makeremittance_time, makeremittance_price, makeremittance_paynumber, makeremittance_name, makeremittance_number, makeremittance_payuserid, makeremittance_payname, makeremittance_branch) values (#{makeremittanceSerialnumber}, #{makeremittanceTime}, #{makeremittancePrice}, #{makeremittancePaynumber}, #{makeremittanceName}, #{makeremittanceNumber}, #{makeremittancePayuserid}, #{makeremittancePayname}, #{makeremittanceBranch})
mapper.update:
update js_bank_account.makeremittance
makeremittance_serialnumber = #{makeremittanceSerialnumber},
makeremittance_time = #{makeremittanceTime},
makeremittance_price = #{makeremittancePrice},
makeremittance_paynumber = #{makeremittancePaynumber},
makeremittance_name = #{makeremittanceName},
makeremittance_number = #{makeremittanceNumber},
makeremittance_payuserid = #{makeremittancePayuserid},
makeremittance_payname = #{makeremittancePayname},
makeremittance_branch = #{makeremittanceBranch},
where makeremittance_id = #{makeremittanceId}
